name: LNO_LAB_AUDIT_TRL
description: This table contains information for the audit trail of Patient Summary Extract (LNO) records.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the LNO record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PRINT_INSTANT
columns.description: These are the instants that copies of the report were printed.

columns.name: DEVICE_ID
columns.description: These are the devices used to print the report.

columns.name: FREE_TEXT_FAX_NUM
columns.description: These are the numbers of the fax machines the report was sent to.

columns.name: NUM_OF_COPIES
columns.description: These are the number of copies of the report sent to each given destination.

columns.name: REQUESTING_USER_ID
columns.description: These are the users who requested a copy of the report.

columns.name: RCPNT_EMPLOYEE_ID
columns.description: These are the employees who received a copy of the report.

columns.name: RCPNT_PROV_ID
columns.description: These are the providers who received a copy of the report.

columns.name: RCPNT_FREE_TEXT
columns.description: These are the recipients of the report in freetext.

columns.name: RCPNT_SUBMITTER_ID
columns.description: These are the submitters which received a copy of the report.

columns.name: RCPNT_SUBMITTER_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: TYPE_OF_RECIP_C_NAME
columns.description: For each provider recipient of the report, this indicates if the provider is an authorizing provider, a PCP, or a CC recipient.

columns.name: RCPNT_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: These are the departments who received a copy of the report.

columns.name: RCPNT_PT_RQG_ID
columns.description: Stores the patient who received a copy of the report. The patient database is RQG.
